p:
A very small fraction of close contacts making up only <1% of the surface occurs between two hydrogen atoms of the phenyl ring at the star periphery with distances of 2.04 or 2.30
A ˚
. This type of close contact is on the spikes of the fingerprint plots as well ( Figure 4d). The N⋯H, C⋯C, N⋯N contacts are marked as blue, meaning that these atoms are relatively far from each other in the crystals.
